attributes.action: introduce a larger standard car wheel radius to enable reduced fuel consumption for equivalent distances travelled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A simple concept.  A car wheel with double the standard circumference will cover twice the distance in a single rotation of the wheel axle.  Therefore, introducing a larger standard manufacturing radius for car wheels will reduce carbon emissions.

Petition the government to make a larger car wheel radius an industry standard.
